attributes.action: Place a cap on charity wages and bonuses.
attributes.additional_details: To stop individuals taking advantage of people and animals that can be considered vulnerable or in a vulnerable position, such as war or natural disaster. To see a far bigger portion go to those that need help, rather than the vast amount going on administration and wages. The aim of any person in a charity should be to make their position redundant, not make a living out of other's misfortune.
attributes.background: Stop high salaries and bonuses being given to individuals that are in excess of the National Average Wage (£34,963 in 2023).

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of individual charities.
